mapper.insert: insert into Customer (CU_Account, CU_Name, CU_Age, CU_Password, CU_IsMember, CU_Longitude, CU_Latitude, CU_Balance) value (#{accountccount},#{name},#{age},#{password},#{isMember},#{longitude},#{latitude},#{balance})
insert into Car (C_Rego, C_Color, C_Brand, C_Describe, C_Status, CU_Account) value (#{rego},#{color},#{brand},#{describe},#{status},#{account})

insert into Assistant (AS_Account, AS_Name, AS_Age, AS_Password, AS_IsPass, AS_IsIdle, AS_Longitude, AS_Latitude, AS_Balance) value (#{account},#{name},#{age},#{password},#{isPass},#{isFree},#{longitude},#{latitude},#{balance})
